Welcome to our movie genre identifier app! You can enter a movie description in the text field and click the button to discover its genre

patterns: How do I use the app?
responses: Using our app is simple! Just type the description of a movie in the provided text field and press the 'Identify' button. We'll analyze the description and display the movie's genre.
You can find out the genre of a movie by describing it in the text field and clicking the 'Identify' button. Give it a try!

patterns: Can you explain how this app works?
responses: This app analyzes movie descriptions provided by users. It utilizes Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to classify the genre of movies based on their plot descriptions. The app then displays the predicted genres such as action, comedy, drama, etc.

patterns: What techniques are used in this app?
Can you tell me about the techniques employed in this app?
How does this app process the data?
responses: This app uses various Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques such as text cleaning, TF-IDF vectorization for feature extraction, and Multinomial Naive Bayes for classification. It preprocesses the movie plot descriptions by cleaning the text, converting it into numerical features using TF-IDF, and then employs a Multinomial Naive Bayes classifier to predict movie genres based on these features.

patterns: What features are available in the free mode?
Tell me about the free plan.
What can I do with the free version?
responses: In the free mode, you can input movie descriptions and receive genre predictions based on the provided plot. The free plan offers basic functionalities such as analyzing movie genres using the available NLP techniques.

patterns: What does the pro mode offer?
Tell me about the features in the pro version.
What are the benefits of upgrading to pro?
responses: Our Pro mode is currently under development, aiming to introduce advanced features like enhanced genre classification accuracy, personalized recommendations, additional NLP techniques, and more. Stay tuned for the upcoming features and improvements!

patterns: What is the difference between free and pro modes?
How does the pro version differ from the free one?
responses: The free mode allows basic movie genre predictions using NLP techniques. Our Pro mode, currently in development, will introduce advanced features such as improved accuracy, personalized recommendations, and additional NLP techniques to enhance the movie genre classification experience.
